Reviews.Title: Ad is incorrect. The network bands are incorrect. There is no 1700/2100.
Reviews.Author: Joyful Mourning - A True Love Story "Doc-comp...
Reviews.Content: NOT THE BANDS ADVERTISED. CHECK CAREFULLY.Description for the bands the phone works on are WRONG! It DOES NOT work on 1700/2100 which is necessary for WIND Mobile in Canada.A beautiful phone for someone else but this seller did not check carefully enough what bands this dual sim phone worked on. There are several versions of the Moto G. One sim phones, two sim phones and even different networks thatthey work on. The third-party reseller claims he cannot change the description which seems silly to me. He should have asked Amazon to change it then.Reseller finally refunded my money and shipping although it was like pulling teeth to get it done.

Reviews.Title: budget king
Reviews.Author: pumpal
Reviews.Content: Not much left to say about Moto G and this is the dual-sim version. Fully supported freqs where I live (Europe). With KitKat 4.4.2 and lite to moderate usage, I see battery life 2-4 days which is more then expected.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just received the phone a couple of days ago and its even better than I expected. it has a good feel to it, quality phone ,amazing speed, amazing graphics. Will recommend this phone to anyone. Far better than my samsung galaxy.

Reviews.Title: Not for T-MOBILE
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, but I does NOT support T-Mobile (3G) data in areas that have not been re-farmed. Sent it back and got an Sony Xperia M C2004 - Dual SIM, which works great.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone; wish they'd mentioned it comes with a "Type G plug" charger
Reviews.Author: Shani-doe
Reviews.Content: I love the phone. It's perfect size for my hands, not like one of those huge Samsung Note or similar phones that are waay big for a gal's hands. Fairly simply operation - I have most crucial operations figured out. A few down sides it - it doesn't come with a USB cable so I have to go buy one. The need for this is there is no way to set up your own music as ringtone unless you manage to put the sound clip in the ringtone folder, and unless i am missing something here (and I have googled to see if I am) you can't simply just move or copy/paste anything to the ringtones. I think you have to connect the phone to the computer using USB to do that.The reason I gave only 4 starts is not because of that, though. The phone came with an charger that has a "Type G" plug (the type British use), so you need an adapter to charge it whether you are using it in USA or many parts of Asia. I wish this was mentioned in the product details so I could have ordered an adapter also at the same time from Amazon and saved myself the hassle of having to go get one.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PERFORMANCE AT AFFORDABLE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Sampson
Reviews.Content: All that I will say is that this amazing performance, design, battery life, great HD display, etc, at unbelievably affordable price.It is just great. And remember Kitkat upgrade is assured.

Reviews.Title: Uncomplette information
Reviews.Author: Enrique Zelaya
Reviews.Content: I bought this model because use dual-sim, but I thought was 16GB internal memory and it is 8GB, the others spec I'm impressed

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: JUSTIN KYLE HARRINGA
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone with excellent battery life. My wife loves it and it has everything she needs. I would highly recommend it for a reasonably priced smartphone.

Reviews.Title: quit working after 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: materialman
Reviews.Content: do not buy this junk, it freezes, won't turn on, reboots on its own, spend more money or don't get a smart phone

Reviews.Title: This is a good buy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying this phone. It is quite capable and the design is just right. The price is perfect. I  bought this phone as a backup for my Nexus 4. Because I travel, it is good to have the second SIM capability. Now I am considering it as my primary phone!

Reviews.Title: Handy economy phone
Reviews.Author: nacanjry
Reviews.Content: This dual sim phone works great with my Rogers (Canada) and Tmobile (USA) cards, travelling across boarder is fantastic now. The speed is fast as it is quad-core phone. I had concern with camera before buying but the picture quality is pretty good after actual using it. Strong recommend.

Reviews.Title: Incomplete information about memory!!! 8GB only!!!
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: I bought this smart phone a few days earlier, but what a surprise when I opened the back cover and discovered that it had 8GB of memory instead of 16GB!!!With the price I paid (around US$238,00), I could easily find a dual SIM with 16GB of memory!!!Now I am in Brazil and I can not change the product anymore.The information of memory is not available for this product!!!

Reviews.Title: few issues to share
Reviews.Author: BHANU PUTI
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone from cell source with amazon prime shipping.The only issue is the charger is european , they packed it with an incompatible american adopter. The phone has a gmail id registered with it , an user account " hansg0045@gmail.com, if i remember right. But, it has no activated mail box etc. I deleted it, registered with my email, upgraded to kitkat. The phone is up and running. Liked it thus far. I do not think the phone was used before , but really do not have a clue about that email account .

Reviews.Title: good phone in this price range.
Reviews.Author: siva sankar
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the product and its worthy phone to get in this price range. Touch is really good and it would have been good, if we have more powerful battery than this.

Reviews.Title: European Charger - Not stated in product description
Reviews.Author: Karthik Viswanathan
Reviews.Content: I just received this phone and found that it had a European style charger. I didnt see this explicitly stated anywhere. Customers would be better served if major items are stated very explicitly. Looks like we now the customer needs to be very careful with buying products from the Amazon Martketplace

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
3G 850 / 900 / 1700 / 1900 / 2100
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi hotspot
High quality 5 MP camera with autofocus
Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), upgradable to v4.4.2 (KitKat)
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Moto G (XT1033) Dual Sim, 5MP, 3G, Quad-Core Factory Unlocked World Mobile Phone - Black
